Public Member Functions

 CREABlock ($prayfile, $name, $content, $flags)
 Instantiate a new CREABlock.

Detailed Description

Block for defining a Creature's current state.

The binary format of this block is completely un-understood.

Definition at line 8 of file CREABlock.php.

Member Function Documentation

CREABlock::CREABlock ( $  prayfile,
$  name,
$  content,
$  flags 
)

Instantiate a new CREABlock.

If $prayfile is not null, all the data about this CREABlock will be read from the PRAYFile.

Parameters:
$prayfile The PRAYFile associated with this CREA block. It is allowed to be null.
$name The name of this block.
$content This block's content.
$flags Any flags this block may have
